text: om'me nagarada janaru niddeyalliddaga avaru nagaravannu pravesisidaru. Alli avaru, ibbaru paraspara jagaladuttiruvudannu kandaru. Avarallobbanu avara palayadavanagiddanu mattu innobbanu avara satru palayadavanagiddanu. Avara palayadavanu, avara satru palayadavana virud'dha avara neravannu bedidanu. Musa atanige (satru palayadavanige) hodedaru mattu adu atana antyakke karanavayitu. Avaru (musa) ‘‘idu saitanana krtya. Avanu khandita spastavagi darigedisuva satruvagiddane’’ endaru
